name: fresherflow
description: Job & Walk-in Opportunity Platform - Proper Monorepo

scripts.kill:port: powershell -Command "$p = (Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 5000 -EA SilentlyContinue).OwningProcess | Select-Object -First 1; if ($p) { taskkill /F /PID $p } else { Write-Host 'Port 5000 is free' }"
scripts.kill:web-port: powershell -Command "$p = (Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3000 -EA SilentlyContinue).OwningProcess | Select-Object -First 1; if ($p) { taskkill /F /PID $p } else { Write-Host 'Port 3000 is free' }"
scripts.kill:ports: npm run kill:web-port && npm run kill:port
scripts.dev: npm run kill:port && turbo run dev
scripts.dev:stack: concurrently -k -n API,WEB -c green,cyan "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.dev:start: npm run kill:ports && npm run dev:stack
scripts.deploy:api: npx turbo run db:generate --filter=fresherflow-api && npx turbo run build --filter=fresherflow-api
scripts.clean: rimraf apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist node_modules
